name: Root Boyo!
description:
ROOT BOYO!

Root Boyo has a problem! He cannot get into the flower unless he walks those roots off!

Help him walk around and get into the flower~ But careful! Stepping over your roots its a prohibited zone!

How To Play!
  • Use WASD to MOVE
  • Every step you take will leave a Root behind~
  • Use K to go BACK

Walk until your roots are drained! If you decide to go back careful not to consume those roots again!
